source.c3695599:
while True:
    verb = input ("Enter an English verb('q' to quit): ")
    verb = verb.lower()
    if verb == "q":
        break 
    else: 
        print(verb)
        print("\t" + "gerund: " + ing(verb)) 
        print("\t" + "third person singular: " + thirdps(verb))
        print("\t" + "past simple: " + ed1(verb))
        print("\t" + "past participle: " + ed2(verb))
source.3a176f79:
#gerund
def ing(verb):
    if verb in modal_verbs:
        ing = " "
    elif verb == "refer":
        ing = verb + "r" + "ing"
    elif verb == "flip":
        ing = verb + "p" + "ing"
    elif verb[-2] == "i" and verb[-1] == "e":
        ing = verb[:-2] + "y" + "ing"
    elif verb[-1] == "y":
            if len (verb) > 2:
                ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb[-1] == "x":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb [-1] == "w":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb [-1] == "r":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb [-1] == "p":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb [-1] == "c":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ing = verb + "k" +"ing"
    elif not is_vowel(verb[-1]) and is_vowel(verb[-2]) and not is_vowel(verb[-3]):
        ing = verb + verb[-1] + "ing"
    elif verb[-1] == "e" and not verb =="see" and not verb == "be":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ing = verb[:-1] + "ing"
    elif verb[-1] =="bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxyz":
            if len(verb) > 3:
                ing = verb[:-1] + "ing"
    else:
        ing = verb + "ing"
    return ing
#vowels
def is_vowel(letter):
    if letter in "aeiou":
        return True
    else: 
        return False
    
#third person singular
def thirdps(verb):
    if verb in modal_verbs:
        thirdps = " "
    elif verb == "be":
        thirdps = "is"
    elif verb == "have":
        thirdps = "has"
    elif verb == "shed":
        thirdps = "shed"
    elif verb[-1] == "o":
        thirdps = verb + "es"
    elif verb[-1] == "x":
        thirdps = verb + "es"
    elif verb[-1] == "s":
        thirdps = verb + "es"
    elif verb[-1] == "z":
        thirdps = verb + "es"
    elif verb[-1] == "s" and verb[-2] == "s":
        thirdps = verb + "es"
    elif verb[-1] == "h" and verb[-2] == "c":
        thirdps = verb + "es"
    elif verb[-1] == "h" and verb[-2] == "s":
        thirdps = verb + "es"
    elif verb[-1] == "y" and is_vowel(verb[-2]):
        thirdps = verb + "s" 
    elif verb[-1] == "y" and not is_vowel(verb[-2]):
        thirdps = verb[:-1] + "ies"
    else:
        thirdps = verb + "s"
    return thirdps

#past simple
def ed1(verb):
    if verb in irreg_verbs:
        ed1 = irreg_verbs[verb][0]
    elif verb in modal_verbs:
        ed1 = " "
    elif verb == "refer":
        ed1 = verb + "r" + "ed"
    elif verb == "flip":
        ed1 = verb + "p" + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "y" and is_vowel(verb[-2]):
        ed1 = verb + "ed" 
    elif verb[-1] == "y" and not is_vowel(verb[-2]):
        ed1 = verb[:-1] + "ied"   
    elif verb[-1] == "x":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ed1 = verb + "ed"
    elif verb [-1] == "w":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ed1 = verb + "ed"
    elif verb [-1] == "r":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ed1 = verb + "ed"
    elif verb [-1] == "p":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ed1 = verb + "ed"
    elif verb [-1] == "c":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ed1 = verb + "k" +"ed"
    elif not is_vowel(verb[-1]) and is_vowel(verb[-2]) and not is_vowel(verb[-3]):
        ed1 = verb + verb[-1] + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "e":
        ed1 = verb + "d"
    else: 
        ed1 = verb + "ed" 
    return ed1

#past participle
def ed2(verb):
    if verb in irreg_verbs:
        ed2 = irreg_verbs[verb][1]
    elif verb in modal_verbs:
        ed2 = " "
    elif verb == "refer":
        ed2 = verb + "r" + "ed"
    elif verb == "flip":
        ed2 = verb + "p" + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "y" and is_vowel(verb[-2]):
        ed2 = verb + "ed" 
    elif verb[-1] == "y" and not is_vowel(verb[-2]):
        ed2 = verb[:-1] + "ied" 
    elif verb[-1] == "x":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ed2 = verb + "ed"
    elif verb [-1] == "w":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ed2 = verb + "ed"
    elif verb [-1] == "r":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ed2 = verb + "ed"
    elif verb [-1] == "p":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ed2 = verb + "ed"
    elif verb [-1] == "c":
            if len(verb) > 2:
                ed2 = verb + "k" +"ed"
    elif not is_vowel(verb[-1]) and is_vowel(verb[-2]) and not is_vowel(verb[-3]):
        ed2 = verb + verb[-1] + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "e":
        ed2 = verb + "d"
    else: 
        ed2 = verb + "ed" 
    return ed2

#modal_verbs

            "can",
